评论详情: This top is soo soft and comfortable. The fit is a bit big and I could’ve confidently sized down. It’s super cute and a great price for good quality.

I love these hoodies.  I have the black, green and brown.  If you want warm, this is not it.  It is a thinner, silky feeling material that washes and dries well and does not pill.  Pretty tough to wrinkle unless you really ball it up and then put some weight on it.  They do run large.  First one was an XXL.  Lost 70 pounds so I got another in large.  That still was a bit large.  So went for the medium when I bought the brown one.  Still loose but not overly so.  I'm 5'5" and weigh 170 pounds, 40C.  The XXL fit loosely when I weighed 247.
This is super soft and comfy.  Got the XXL nd could have done the XL as it is very roomy!  I’ll definitely be buying more!

评论概述: The material is soft and lightweight
评论详情: This hoodie is exactly what I was looking for in terms of comfort and style. The loose, casual fit makes it perfect for layering or wearing on its own. The ribbed knit design adds a nice texture, giving it a slightly elevated look compared to a basic sweatshirt. The black color goes with everything, making it super versatile for both casual and more dressed-up outfits.  The material is soft and lightweight, yet cozy enough to keep me warm during cooler days. The long sleeves provide extra coverage, and the overall fit is flattering without being too tight or restrictive. It's great for running errands, lounging at home, or even going out for a casual day.  If you’re looking for a relaxed yet chic hoodie, this one is a great choice. It’s comfortable, stylish, and perfect for everyday wear. Highly recommended!

I love this shirt - I almost didn't buy it based on some of the less favorable reviews but I'm so glad I did.  I did size down - I am usually between a L and XL and I got the L.  It is roomy, but comfortably so.  I don't feel like it is so big that it looks sloppy.
Cute top but size down I got an XL and its huge.

I wasn’t sure what to expect when I ordered this, but I hoped that it would cover my backside so I could wear it with leggings. Mission accomplished. I am 5’4” and fall between a size 12 and 14. I ordered a large, and it fits well. It is roomy and has the material has a lot of give to it. I wore it to work today with a vest over it, leggings and boots. I am super comfy yet look put together. (My ideal work outfit!) Fabric is light and flowy.

I love over large baggy shirts in colder temperatures but got overzealous with this one and intended to return it. Decided to give it a 2nd chance and so glad I did! Incredibly soft and very warm. It's a keeper!

So I got a size XL as I usually prefer a nice oversized look with my hoodies and this is PERFECT!!! It’s super cute, light weight, it’s fits perfectly as a nice oversized hoodie. The quality of the materials are very good. It’s good for if you’re just relaxing in cooler weather as it’s not super thick but it’ll keep you warm if there’s a breeze outside. The color is also so cute, I believe I got the peachy toned one which I love, it’s super cute with the stripes!!! I’d absolutely recommend if you’re looking for something comfy, cute and light weight.
Very comfortable without being bulky. Soft and winter weight for Florida winters. I possibly could have gone down a size to a xl. Still love it.
You will not want to take it off!
I bought an x large it fits nice and roomy. It's a hoodie w a pouch pocket. Very nice quality and ribbed texture.
Love the fit, color options, great to wear in cooler weather. First time ordered a large, ordered a medium this time and fits great!
Light weight and soft. Casual and comfortable. Nicely made. Sizing on point. I purchased the green and it’s great.
This hoodie is very light weight and feels wonderful on, the color was great and fit perfect.
Love LOVE Love this hoodie. Super cute, stylish, comfortable and can wear to work for casual wear or casual Fridays. Of course I had to buy a few. Highly recommend.
I love this soft ribbed hoodie! It’s lightweight but still warm enough. It’s super soft and stretchy material. I highly recommend.
Oversized and didn’t fit. Normally I wear the size I chose, but this came in very bulky and big.

I’m loving this sweatshirt by Dokotoo! Great colors, a very comfy and roomy fit, and the ribbed texture adds an elevated look/feel that you can wear to work on casual Friday’s. I bought a large and it fits perfect.
Nice and warm and quick shipping
I’m not a small person, and this was massive on me. Super wide and just overall very large. The color was pretty, but I had to return.
I love the color and the fit
Very cute, love the length amd is very comfortable! Color is great
Casual but so cute!  I always get compliments and have sent the link to several friends for them to purchase!

评论概述: Not at all what I was expecting
评论详情: I was very drawn to the fabric pattern shown in the pictures and purchased this sweatshirt. As soon as I opened the package, I really disliked the army green. It looked very pea-soupy to me with it's yellow undertone. BUT, I wanted to try it on in case it was just the color I disliked, and I honestly didn't care for the fit either. I wear a medium so I ordered a medium and it was very loose and sloppy looking. Perhaps a small would have been a better choice. It did have an overall nice cut and felt like a decent quality, but I just couldn't make this work. The fabric was lighter weight and comfortable so no complaints there. But I couldn't get over the color and over-size of this shirt and ended up returning it. Unless you're going for an oversized look, I would suggest sizing down. The stripped pattern is very prominent so be sure to order in a color you really like as it's not subtle.
Perfect weight!

The color is not entirely accurate to the item photos. I'm not sure if it's an optical illusion based on the white stripes but it's definitely a different shade than what I was expecting. I do think the hoodie is very soft but I have noticed more than a few loose threads and fluff upon first wearing, so you will need to be sure that you wash it before wearing. It's lightweight and not super warm so great for a nice summer jacket.

This is a great, cozy sweatshirt that washes well. It's lightweight and loose fitting in my usual size small, and the fabric is soft and not lined. It looks just like the product photos. One thing to note is they tell you do not put it in the dryer. Personally, I dried it on low heat and it was ok, but I found the special care instructions inconvenient for a casual sweatshirt like this.
Like the fit and it’s made of a nice light material. Little worried what may happen if snagged but so far so good. Did smell a little funky upon receiving though

This is a cute top but with a couple small issues. The material was thinner than I expected, but it is soft and comfortable. It is not very warm, but good for a cool summer evening. The inside of the hood is singled layered, it is made of the unfinished side of the material, and it shows when wearing it. It really isn't as noticable as the closeup picture makes it seem, but once you notice it, it sticks out. My wife's long hair usually covers it.  Ordered a size small which is what my wife typically wears, and it fit as expected since I believe it is intended to be oversized. Still like it but with the issues and at a price of almost $30, I'm giving it 4 stars.

评论概述: Love the feel of this shirt
评论详情: True to size and color.  Very soft.

I gave 4 stars because I thought the sweater was cotton, but has no cotton. Nonetheless, it is very soft, snuggly, true to size, fits well, looks good, breathes well, is insulating and has a neat texture and thickness that is soft yet interesting to the touch. Has a warm hood and kangaroo pouch pocket. Would recommend! I am gifting mine in the future because it is lovely and will make a nice gift!
Fits great!
It’s beautiful and soft but runs big. Should’ve sized down

This looks like a sweatshirt/hoodie with a texture to it. It’s that very spongy, polyester feel material that they use nowadays. The inside is softer and more comfortable. The color is the color.  It fits fine. I wouldn’t wear this out, but it’s fine for knocking around the house, or running errands. The fit is HUGE. I got the small and there is room for another me inside it.

This Dokotoo Women's Pullover Hoodie Sweatshirt is soft and snuggly. The fit is extremely oversized which means you can wear it over all kinds of layers in the winter. It's easy to war with leggings or jeans, but is definitely for casual wear. I wouldn't wear it to work or to church.

I would say this is more of a thin, long sleeve shirt, than a sweatshirt. It is very cute and very soft. It seems to be very comfortable to wear. It is just not something I would wear on a cold night like I would a sweatshirt. Would make a better cool night cover. It fits bigger than I expected But it still looks good. Other than expecting it to be thicker than what it is it’s a really nice casual top.

I ordered this as a light weight hoodie for the warm fall days. The color is very pretty and the material is good weight. I ordered a size up because of layering so mine is a tad big, but it would be so cute on its own in true to size fit. It is cozy and soft. Good fall hoodie!

Women’s pull over ripped knit shirt it’s a good value nice quality. The material is thin so it’s great if you need just a little bit of something to keep you warm on those summer nights when it’s a little cooler. The ribbed part looks as a different color than what the actual Hoodie is. The ribbed waist and the ribbed wrist pieces are not a stretchy as the shirt itself, which is added plus so it doesn’t stretch out easily like most sweatshirts do around the arm and the waist. It’s true to color by picture. There’s no difference. It is what it shows it to be this is very soft comfortable pullover hoodie.

评论概述: Cute loose fitting top but somewhat see through
评论详情: I give this 5 stars for comfortable fit but knocked off a star for the following: - I put this on over a t-shirt and I could see everything through it. Anything classified as a sweatshirt should not be see through and should be a bit warmer! - The color said 'smoke gray' but this is more of an apricot. It does match the picture but I wasn't sure what I would be getting. Thought maybe the picture was wrong!

Got this for my partner, and she seems to really like it.  She wears it all the time around the house, especially when we're just relaxing in the evenings.  It looks really comfortable and cozy – perfect for snuggling up on the couch.  I know she likes clothes that aren't too tight, and this one seems to fit her just right. It seems like a good quality hoodie, and it definitely gets a lot of use!

This is a favorite in my new fall wardrobe already. It's so comfy and fits perfectly. It's ribbed and so so soft.  It's loose without being too oversized. It's not long, but it's also not short or cropped, it's just right.  Sizing seems to be spot-on to me. I usually wear an L or XL in this type of top, and a size L fits me great.  I love that the black color has a slight vintage vibe to it--it's not a really deep black, or maybe the light just tends to give it a bit more texture, but either way, it's interesting to look at and you can see the visible texture instead of it just looking like a black void.  And I'm thankful for the kangaroo pocket! It seems all too common for women's pullover hoodies to skip the big pocket, but thankfully this one doesn't.  Love this hoodie and I'd definitely recommend it.
I really love everything about this hoodie. It is a lighter material and it is very comfortable. It fits true to size and washes very well. It's super cute.

Cute! This has more of a boho/hippy vibe which I love but keep in mind this is oversized so I would stick with your normal size or size down if you don't want it so big. It's soft and I was worried about it pilling in the wash but it hasn't happened yet.
This is very soft and comfortable. The color is the perfect green.

This shirt is very comfortable and I love the pockets. The material is nice, it is well made, the perfect thickness so you are not too warm, but it is not a sweatshirt. The shirt fits as expected. The coffee color is pretty and a good color year round!
I normally do not write reviews. If you are buying this off of what the pictures look like take another look. The only reason I did not give it 2 stars is the Fabric is very soft

I like the casual and comfortable fit of this hoodie.  It is not too heavy and suffocating like some.  I am excited to to take it to my vacation to Vermont this fall.  It will be perfect for a short hike, cheese tasting or a walk in the woods.  Would be great for a fall evening bon fire or layered up for cooler weather.  I like the color and comfort.  Great buy.
This is huge!

This pullover hoodie is amazing! It has an oversized fit, which makes it super comfortable and perfect for lounging or layering. The relaxed fit is just what I was looking for, and it feels great to wear.  The color matches the photo exactly, and it’s very flattering. I love how it looks on me, and it goes well with pretty much everything in my wardrobe. The color really stands out and adds a nice touch to any casual outfit.  I absolutely love this sweater! It’s lightweight, so it’s easy to wear without feeling too warm, but still cozy enough for cooler days. Overall, I’m really happy with it and would definitely recommend it!
Very comfy and light love it

This a soft, stretchy sweatshirt that is more for summer as it is a thin material. It’s oversized so it would fit easily over other shirts. The ribbed waist and the ribbed wrist pieces are not out of the same material and more like a normal sweatshirt would have. The hood is a single layer of fabric with the seam exposed on the inside of the hood. I ordered the Rose Red, which is a nice bright/hot pink, in a size Small. If you prefer a more fitted look, you may want to size down.

Great fit. Soft, lightweight, comfortable. This has nice pockets and is perfect for a casual hooded sweatshirt. One thing I really like is that the hood is not very heavy. Some sweatshirts have hoods that are so heavy they tug on the shirt and make the fit uncomfortable. That's not the case with this.

The fabric is heavy and very stretchy... not heavy duty, but I can feel the weight on my shoulders.  The weight and elasticity makes it very drapey.  This will be a fun hoodie to see what I might want to wear underneath it or just wear solo.  I like it... but it is different than most hoodies due to the stretchiness and weight.

A very cute oversized hoodie! I like my pullover hoodies to fit well so I sized down to a large (normally I am an xl/xxl). The hood itself is definitely oversized with lots of stretch everywhere. The hood itself covers my whole face when I put it on my head. Long sleeved and the sleeves tapered down to the wrist in a cuff. This pullover hoodie does have the front pouch pocket to keep your hands warm (or for storage). The waist is banded, it does not hang down or drape. This pullover hoodie does attract string and pet hair (both of which brush right off).
My wife likes this and will get a lot of use from it this fall and winter.

Another clothing item from this brand that does not disappoint! I am typically a size L/XL in tops, and I ordered this hoodie in jungle green and XL. The XL fits nice and loose, and the color is spot on. The material is so incredibly soft and feels like you’re wearing a blanket. It looks so cute with leggings or yoga shorts. This will be so great to wear in the fall!!

I absolutely love this hoodie!  It is very comfortable, and fits perfectly.  The material is lightweight, super stretchy, and ribbed.  I used the size chart provided, and it was spot on!  It is perfect for football weather.  I love the way it fits, looks, and feels.  I will wear this throughout the fall, winter, and spring.
I really liked....just too over-sized. Zthe 2-stars is because there was not an option to exchange for a smaller size.
I would definitely call this a shoody not a sweatshirt. Light weight but really soft. It has a large cut. I went down a size and it fits perfectly. Quickly becoming one of my favorites.
this hoodie is extremely OVERSIZED.  I would size down at least one if not two sizes for this sweatshirt.  Decent quality though.
It’s long, soft, fluffy, stretchy, has a pouch, has a hood, and I love the color. So….Perfect.,

I have a lot of young ladies in my family. Trying to find gifts for them, being a guy is hit and miss. They are growing up and trying to find clothing that they will like is a daunting task. I know they will tell me, they like it but I am hoping they mean it.  I have a young lady in the family whose taste are maturing. She is starting to look at clothing more eloquent than before. Starting to pay more attention to jewelry and wanting to dress a bit more adult oriented. This Hoodie is soft and hangs nice on the body while being loose fitting. She can wear it with her jeans but can go with nice pants and even shorts and some skirts. The material lends itself to versatility of maturing styles.
I was hoping it would fit a little nicer. The waist isn't flattering at all.

This has a heaviness to it ,but also a thinner material and so when wearing it just felt like it was pulling my upper body down.loked just drab like on myslef,might be better for for others,but not for me.its oversized a bit too so that heavy extra material really drags down my appearance.
The color was misleading. I got the green and it was a strange color of green. I also ordered my normal size (XL) and it was really baggy. The fabric is thin too. I returned it.
